page.title: 09HOMELIFE-LUCY DAWSON(8years)
page.content: I get up at 8.00am and I get dressed. Then I go downstairs for breakfast. After that I walk down the drive and a school car comes for me.School starts at 9.00am.In the morning we do diary, spelling,arithmetic and reading.At 10.15 we get a play break I play games with my friends Margaret and Laura. Lunch is from 12.00 to 1.00pm.I bring a packed lunch from home usually sandwiches,an apple and something to drink.I like fruit juice the best. School finishes at 3.30 and I either get the school car home or I stay down in Portnahaven and play with my friends.Sometimes we go crab fishing but most of the time we just play games like "hide and seek"or "rounders".My Mum collects me and drives me home.We have tea and then I do my homework then watch television I go to bed at 8.30pm.
